description: Convert a PNM file to an Utah Raster Tools RLE image file. More information: https://netpbm.sourceforge.net/doc/pnmtorle.html.

useCases.description: Convert a PNM image to an RLE image:
Print PNM header information to stdout:
Include a transparency channel in the output image in which every black pixel is set to fully transparent and every other pixel is set to fully opaque:
